name: 3and3s-pocket-dex
description: 3&3s Pocket Dex â€” A PokeMMO Companion Tool.

scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && (cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug)
scripts.android:build:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && (cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease)
scripts.push-release: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('git push origin HEAD',{stdio:'inherit'}); execSync('git push origin v'+v,{stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "v%s" && npm run push-release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "v%s" && npm run push-release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "v%s" && npm run push-release
